name: Spaghetti Bolognese
steps: Cook the spaghetti according to package instructions
In a separate pan, heat the olive oil over medium heat
Add the onion and garlic and cook until the onion is translucent
Add the ground beef and cook until browned
Stir in the tomato sauce and simmer for 10 minutes
Serve the spaghetti topped with the sauce

name: Caesar Salad
steps: Wash and chop the romaine lettuce
In a small bowl, whisk together the lemon juice, olive oil, garlic, dijon mustard, salt, and pepper to make the dressing
Toss the lettuce with the dressing
Top with croutons and shaved parmesan cheese

name: Beef Tacos
steps: Cook the ground beef in a pan over medium heat
Stir in the taco seasoning and cook for another 5 minutes
Assemble the tacos by filling each shell with the beef, lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, and sour cream

name: Chicken Stir-Fry
steps: Cook the rice according to package instructions
Cut the chicken breast into small pieces and season with salt and pepper
Heat the oil in a pan over high heat
Add the chicken and cook until browned
Add the broccoli, carrots, onion, and garlic, and stir-fry for 5 minutes
Stir in the soy sauce and serve over the rice
